18 class Trace : public StringSmall {
19 public:
20  Trace();

22  Trace& operator=(const char * a){ String::operator=(a); return *this; }
23  Trace& operator=(const String & a){ String::operator=(a); return *this; }
24 
25  inline void message() HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE { posix_trace_event(POSIX_TRACE_MESSAGE, c_str(), size()); }
26  inline void warning() HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE { posix_trace_event(POSIX_TRACE_WARNING, c_str(), size()); }
27  inline void critical() HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE { posix_trace_event(POSIX_TRACE_CRITICAL, c_str(), size()); }
28  inline void fatal() HWPL_ALWAYS_INLINE { posix_trace_event(POSIX_TRACE_FATAL, c_str(), size()); }

30 };
